name: manaplus
deps: sdl_gfx, sdl_image, sdl_mixe, sdl_net, sdl_ttf, sdl2_image
desc:
The Mana World (TMW) is a serious effort to create an innovative
free and open source MMORPG. TMW uses 2D graphics and aims to create a
large and diverse interactive world. It is licensed under the GPL,
